properties.name: blast-wrapper.task-status-checking.thread-amount
properties.description: Amount of threads allowed to run command to blast simultaneously.

properties.name: blast-wrapper.task-status-checking.interval
properties.description: Check frequency of new tasks on database.

properties.name: blast-wrapper.blast-db.defaultDbType
properties.description: Molecule type of input, values can be nucl or prot.

properties.name: blast-wrapper.blast-db.defaultDbVersion
properties.description: Version 5 (taxonomy aware) is the default starting with the 2.10.0 release.

properties.name: blast-wrapper.command.defaultParseSeqIds
properties.description: Parse bar delimited sequence identifiers (e.g., gi).
